sources.title: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War Final (2021)
sources.description: Shuchiin Academy students Shirogane Miyuki and Shinomiya Kaguya have concluded their election campaigns for student council president but have yet to establish the victor in the competition of love. The student council convenes with new members, but the two still can't escape the curse that "whoever confesses their romantic feelings first is the loser," and the battle continues to get the other to make a declaration of love. (Source: JFDb) ~~ Adapted from the manga "Kaguya-sama: Love Is War" (かぐや様は告らせたい〜天才たちの恋愛頭脳戦〜) by Akasaka Aka (赤坂アカ).

metadata.Plot: After years of intense mental battle, the war between Kaguya and Shirogane heads towards its crashing end. Who will be the first to admit their love? Is it Kaguya?or Shirogane? Let's find out!!!.
metadata.Actors: Shô Hirano, Kanna Hashimoto, Hayato Sano
